ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ordon | |- Ord On |
| 2 |  | #P_0elon | |- (/) e. On |
| 3 |  | #P_unon | |- U. On = On |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqcomi | |- On = U. On |
| 5 |  | #P_dflim2 | |- ( Lim On <-> ( Ord On /\ (/) e. On /\ On = U. On ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 4, 5 | #P_mpbir3an | |- Lim On |
